short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display order and shipment information directly in your customer service system. Requires a Wismotion subscription.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This powerful plugin seamlessly integrates Wismotion with your customer service system, providing a unified platform to manage customer interactions more effectively. By linking Wismotion's order and shipment data with your support tickets, it enables you to access critical information in one place. You can view real-time order statuses, shipment tracking details, and customer queries side-by-side, helping your team resolve issues faster and with greater accuracy. This integration not only improves operational efficiency but also enhances the customer experience by equipping your support staff with the tools they need to deliver personalized and timely responses.
